title: 17th Anniversary 911, Bad Black Men, Benjamin Crump, Nasty House, Beard, Beyonce, George Zimmerman, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: 17th Anniversary 911, Bad Black Men, Benjamin Crump, Nasty House, Beard, Beyonce, George Zimmerman, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Today we remember 911 seventeen years later. The show talks about black men that are known to be bad mf's. Attorney Benjamin Crump talks to show about the events in Dallas, TX. The fellas talk about yo nasty house. Uncle Steve has a new talk show and a new look. George Zimmerman is getting too comfortable with his words and he may have to face the Beyhive. Today's Closing Remarks has a very specific message and much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
